block.text: Ol namba wan tumbuna bilong ol i bin i gat biknem tru. Na long lain bilong ol tasol Krais i kamap man. Krais em i God, na em i stap het bilong olgeta samting. Na oltaim oltaim yumi mas litimapim nem bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But it is not as though the word of God has come to nothing. For they are not all Israel, that are of Israel.

block.text: Oltaim mi save bel sori long pasin bilong ol dispela brata bilong mi, tasol i no olsem mi ting tok bilong God i lus nating. Nogat. Mi save, planti bilong ol man i bin kamap long lain bilong Israel, ol i no lain tru bilong Israel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Neither, because they are Abraham’s seed, are they all children. But,

block.text: Yumi no ken tok olsem, "Ol i kamap long blut bilong Abraham, olsem na olgeta i stap pikinini tru bilong em." Nogat. Bipo God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “In Isaac will your seed be called.”

block.text: "Long Aisak tasol bai ol lain tumbuna pikinini bilong yu i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: That is, it is not the children of the flesh who are children of God, but the children of the promise are counted as a seed.
For this is a word of promise,

block.text: As bilong dispela tok i olsem. Ol pikinini i kamap long blut tasol, ol dispela i no pikinini bilong God. Nogat. Ol pikinini i kamap long pasin bilong bilip long promis bilong God, ol dispela i gat nem olsem lain bilong Abraham.
Dispela promis i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “At the appointed time I will come, and Sarah will have a son.”

block.text: "Long taim mi makim pinis, bai mi kam bek, na long dispela taim Sara bai i gat pikinini man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Not only so, but Rebecca also conceived by one, by our father Isaac.

block.text: Na tingim tu narapela tok bilong God. Tupela pikinini bilong Rebeka i gat wanpela papa tasol, em Aisak, tumbuna bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For being not yet born, neither having done anything good or bad, that the purpose of God according to election might stand, not of works, but of him who calls,
it was said to her,

block.text: Tasol God i bihainim pasin oltaim em i save bihainim, na em i makim man long laik bilong em yet. Em i no tingting long wok man i mekim. Nogat. Em yet i singautim man na makim em. Olsem na taim Rebeka i no karim tupela pikinini yet, na tupela i no bin mekim gutpela pasin o pasin nogut,
God i tokim Rebeka olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The elder will serve the younger.”

block.text: "Pikinini i kamap pastaim, em bai i stap wokboi bilong pikinini i kamap bihain."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as it is written,

block.text: Em i olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Jacob I loved, but Esau I hated.”

block.text: "Mi laikim Jekop, tasol mi no laikim Iso."

ReferenceBlocks.text: What shall we say then? Is there unrighteousness with God? May it never be!
For he said to Moses,

block.text: Olsem na bai yumi tok wanem? Ating bai yumi tok God i mekim pasin i no stret, a? Nogat tru.
God i bin tokim Moses olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will have mercy on whom I have mercy, and I will have compassion on whom I have compassion.”

block.text: "Sapos mi laik marimari long wanpela man, orait bai mi marimari long en. Na sapos mi laik sori long wanpela man, orait bai mi sori long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then it is not of him who wills, nor of him who runs, but of God who has mercy.
For the Scripture says to Pharaoh,

block.text: Olsem na taim God i makim man, dispela i no kamap long laik bilong man na long hatwok bilong em. Nogat. Em i kamap long marimari bilong God tasol.
Na buk bilong God i tok long God i bin tokim king bilong Isip olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “For this very purpose I caused you to be raised up, that I might show in you my power, and that my name might be proclaimed in all the earth.”

block.text: "Mi bin mekim yu i kamap king, bai mi ken soim bikpela strong bilong mi long yu, na bai ol manmeri i ken autim biknem bilong mi long olgeta hap bilong graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, he has mercy on whom he desires, and he hardens whom he desires.

block.text: Olsem na yumi save, sapos God i laik marimari long wanpela man, orait em i save marimari long en. Na sapos em i laik mekim tingting bilong wanpela man i pas, orait em i save mekim olsem long laik bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will say then to me, “Why does he still find fault? For who withstands his will?”

block.text: Tasol ating wanpela bilong yupela bai i tokim mi olsem, "Sapos God i mekim olsem, orait bilong wanem em i save tok yumi gat asua long ol pasin nogut yumi mekim? Husat inap bihainim laik bilong em yet, na sakim laik bilong God?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But indeed, O man, who are you to reply against God? Will the thing formed ask him who formed it, “Why did you make me like this?”

block.text: Tasol yu man, yu husat na yu inap krosim God long pasin em i mekim? Ating sospen graun inap tok olsem long man i bin wokim em, "Bilong wanem yu wokim mi olsem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or hasn’t the potter a right over the clay, from the same lump to make one part a vessel for honor, and another for dishonor?

block.text: Man bilong wokim sospen em i ken kisim wanpela hap graun na long laik bilong em yet, em i ken wokim tupela sospen long en, wanpela naispela sospen bilong gutpela wok, na wanpela sospen nating bilong ol arapela kain wok. Ating dispela pasin i no stret, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: What if God, willing to show his wrath, and to make his power known, endured with much patience vessels of wrath made for destruction.

block.text: God tu i save mekim olsem. Em i laik kamapim ples klia belhat bilong em, bai olgeta man i ken save long bikpela strong bilong em. Ol sospen bilong kisim pe nogut ol i redi pinis long bagarap, tasol em i larim ol na em i wet longtaim long brukim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What if he did this to make known the riches of his glory on vessels of mercy, which he prepared beforehand for glory.

block.text: Long wanem, em i laik bai olgeta man i ken save long bikpela lait na strong bilong en, na long gutpela sindaun tru em i laik givim long ol sospen bilong kisim marimari. Bipo yet em i redim ol dispela sospen pinis bai em i ken givim gutpela sindaun na biknem long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are the ones he chose, not only from the Jews, but also from the Gentiles.

block.text: Ol dispela sospen bilong kisim marimari, em yumi ol manmeri God i bin singautim. Na yumi no kam long lain bilong Juda tasol. Nogat. Yumi kam long ol arapela lain tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As he says also in Hosea,

block.text: Long buk bilong profet Hosea, God i bin tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will call them ‘my people,’ which were not my people; and her ‘beloved,’ who was not beloved.”

block.text: "Dispela ol manmeri bipo ol i no lain bilong mi, bai mi kolim ol lain bilong mi. Na dispela lain mi no bin laikim ol, bihain bai mi laikim ol tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It will be that in the place where it was said to them, ‘You are not my people,’ There they will be called ‘children of the living God.’”

block.text: Na long ples mi bin tokim ol, 'Yupela i no lain manmeri bilong mi,' long dispela ples tasol bai mi tok, 'Yupela i pikinini bilong mi, God i save stap oltaim.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Isaiah cries concerning Israel,

block.text: Na Aisaia i bin tingting long ol Israel na em i bin autim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If the number of the children of Israel are as the sand of the sea, it is the remnant who will be saved;

block.text: "Maski sapos ol manmeri bilong Israel i kamap planti tru olsem wesan bilong nambis, Bikpela bai I kisim bek liklik lain tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for He will finish the work and cut it short in righteousness, because the LORD will make a short work upon the earth.”

block.text: Bikpela i kotim pinis ol manmeri bilong graun, na kwiktaim em bai i mekim save tru long ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As Isaiah has said before,

block.text: Ol dispela samting i kamap olsem bipo Aisaia i bin tok. Em i bin tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Unless the Lord of Armies had left us a seed, we would have become like Sodom, and would have been made like Gomorrah.”

block.text: "Sapos Bikpela I Gat Olgeta Strong i no bin larim liklik lain bilong yumi i stap, bai yumi bagarap pinis, olsem taun Sodom na taun Gomora i bin bagarap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: What shall we say then? That the Gentiles, who didn’t follow after righteousness, attained to righteousness, even the righteousness which is of faith.

block.text: Orait bai yumi tok wanem? Yumi tok olsem. Ol arapela lain i no bin hatwok long kamap stretpela manmeri, ol i kamap stretpela manmeri pinis. Ol i bilip na God i kolim ol stretpela manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Israel, following after a law of righteousness, didn’t arrive at the law of righteousness.

block.text: Na ol Israel i bin hatwok long bihainim lo bilong Moses na kamap stretpela manmeri. Wok bilong lo, em bilong mekim ol manmeri i kamap stretpela manmeri, tasol ol Israel i no bin kamap stretpela manmeri,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Why? Because they didn’t seek it by faith, but as it were by works of the law. They stumbled over the stumbling stone;
even as it is written,

block.text: long wanem, ol i no bihainim pasin bilong bilip. Nogat. Ol i ting, long hatwok bilong ol yet, ol bai i kamap stretpela manmeri. Ston bilong sutim lek em i bin sutim lek bilong ol na ol i pundaun.
Buk bilong God i tok olsem long dispela,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I lay in Zion a stumbling stone and a rock of offense; and no one who believes in him will be disappointed.”

block.text: "Harim. Mi makim pinis wanpela ston bilong sutim lek bilong ol man na mekim ol i pundaun. Na bai mi putim em i stap long maunten Saion. Ol man i bilip long em, ol bai i no inap kisim sem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: ROMANS 10
Brothers, my heart’s desire and my prayer to God is for Israel, that they may be saved.

block.text: Ol brata, bel bilong mi i laikim tumas bai God i kisim bek ol Israel, na oltaim mi save prea long God long dispela samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I testify about them that they have a zeal for God, but not according to knowledge.

block.text: Mi save gut long ol na mi tokaut olsem, ol i strong tumas long bihainim pasin God i laikim. Tasol ol i no klia gut long laik tru bilong God, na ol i mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For being ignorant of God’s righteousness, and seeking to establish their own righteousness, they didn’t subject themselves to the righteousness of God.

block.text: Ol i no save long pasin God i bihainim bilong kolim yumi stretpela man, na ol i laik kamap stretpela man long strong bilong ol yet. Olsem na ol i no bin aninit long God na larim em i mekim ol i kamap stretpela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For Christ is the fulfillment of the law for righteousness to everyone who believes.

block.text: Yumi save, Krais em inapim pinis lo bilong Moses, bai olgeta manmeri i bilip long Krais, ol i ken kamap stretpela manmeri long ai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For Moses writes about the righteousness of the law,

block.text: Moses i raitim tok long pasin ol manmeri i bihainim lo i mas mekim na bai God i kolim ol stretpela manmeri. Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The one who does them will live by them.”

block.text: "Man i bihainim olgeta lo, em bai i stap laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the righteousness which is of faith says this, “Don’t say in your heart, ‘Who will ascend into heaven?’ (that is, to bring Christ down);”

block.text: Tasol man i bihainim pasin bilong bilip na God i kolim em stretpela man, em i bihainim dispela tok, "Nogut yupela i tok long yupela yet olsem, 'Husat bai i go antap long heven?'" Em i olsem yupela i laik bringim Krais i kam daun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “or, ‘Who will descend into the abyss?’ (that is, to bring Christ up from the dead.)
But what does it say?”

block.text: "Na nogut yupela i tok olsem, 'Husat bai i go daun long ples bilong ol man i dai pinis?'" Em i olsem yupela i laik bringim Krais i kam bek long matmat.
Tasol as tingting bilong dispela tok em i olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The word is near you, in your mouth, and in your heart”

block.text: "Dispela tok i stap klostu tru long yupela, insait long bel bilong yupela, na long maus bilong yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: that is, the word of faith, which we preach:

block.text: Em dispela tok bilong bilip mipela i save tokaut long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: that if you will confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord, and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.

block.text: Sapos yu tokaut klia long Jisas em i Bikpela, na sapos long bel bilong yu yu bilip long God i bin kirapim bek em long matmat, orait bai God i kisim bek yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For with the heart, one believes unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.
For the Scripture says,

block.text: Long bel yumi save bilip na God i kolim yumi stretpela manmeri. Na long maus yumi save autim bilip bilong yumi na God i kisim bek yumi.
Buk bilong God i gat tok long dispela samting olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whoever believes in him will not be disappointed.”

block.text: "Ol man i bilip long em, ol bai i no inap kisim sem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For there is no distinction between Jew and Greek; for the same Lord is Lord of all, and is rich to all who call on him.
For,

block.text: Ol Juda na Grik i wankain tasol. Bikpela wanpela tasol em I Bikpela bilong yumi olgeta. Na em i save mekim gut tru long olgeta manmeri i singaut long em na askim em long helpim ol.
Olsem na

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whoever will call on the name of the Lord will be saved.”

block.text: "olgeta manmeri i askim Bikpela long helpim ol, em bai i kisim bek ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: How then will they call on him in whom they have not believed? How will they believe in him whom they have not heard? How will they hear without a preacher?

block.text: Tasol sapos ol i no bilip long em, olsem wanem bai ol i askim em long helpim ol. Na sapos ol i no harim tok long em, olsem wanem bai ol i bilip long em? Na sapos i no gat wanpela i autim tok long ol, olsem wanem bai ol i harim?

ReferenceBlocks.text: And how will they preach unless they are sent? As it is written:

block.text: Na sapos ol i no salim ol man i go bilong autim tok, olsem wanem bai ol i autim? Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How beautiful are the feet of those who preach the Good News of peace, who bring glad tidings of good things!”

block.text: "Ol manmeri i amamas tru long lukim man i kam bilong bringim gutnius."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they didn’t all listen to the glad news. For Isaiah says,

block.text: Tasol i no olgeta manmeri i kisim gutnius. Nogat. Aisaia i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, who has believed our report?”

block.text: "Bikpela, husat i bilipim dispela tok mipela I autim long ol?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: So faith comes by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.

block.text: Orait yumi save, yumi harim tok bilong God na dispela i kirapim bilip. Na dispela tok yumi harim, em i kamap long maus bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I ask, didn’t they hear? Yes, most certainly,

block.text: Tasol mi laik askim olsem, ating ol i no harim dispela gutnius? Nogat. Ol i harim pinis. Yumi save,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Their sound went out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world.”

block.text: "Ol manmeri long olgeta hap bilong graun i harim pinis nek bilong ol. Na tok bilong ol i go inap long olgeta ples."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I ask, didn’t Israel know? First Moses says,

block.text: Na mi gat narapela askim tu. Ating ol Israel i no save long as bilong dispela tok? Nogat. Ol i save pinis. Pastaim yupela i mas tingim dispela tok Moses i bin autim,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will provoke you to jealousy with that which is no nation, with a nation void of understanding I will make you angry.”

block.text: "Bai mi kisim wanpela lain i no gat nem na i samting nating na i no gat gutpela save, na long dispela pasin bai mi mekim yupela i bel nogut na kros."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Isaiah is very bold, and says,

block.text: Na Aisaia tu i bin mekim strongpela tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I was found by those who didn’t seek me. I was revealed to those who didn’t ask for me.”

block.text: "Ol man I no bin wok long painim mi, ol i painim mi pinis. Mi bin kamap ples klia long ol man i no bin askim ol arapela long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But as to Israel he says,

block.text: Tasol Aisaia I bin tingting long ol Israel na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “All day long I stretched out my hands to a disobedient and contrary people.”

block.text: "Long olgeta de mi opim han bilong mi na mi wet long kisim bek ol manmeri i save bikhet na sakim tok bilong mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: ROMANS 11
I ask then, did God reject his people? May it never be! For I also am an Israelite, a descendant of Abraham, of the tribe of Benjamin.

block.text: Orait mi laik askim olsem, ating God i givim baksait pinis long ol manmeri bilong en? Nogat tru. Mi tu mi man bilong Israel. Mi wanpela bilong ol lain tumbuna bilong Abraham. Mi man bilong lain bilong Benjamin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God didn’t reject his people, which he foreknew. Or don’t you know what the Scripture says about Elijah? How he pleads with God against Israel:

block.text: Dispela lain bipo tru God i tok pinis long ol bai i stap lain manmeri bilong en, em i no bin givim baksait long ol. Ating yupela i no save long stori bilong Elaija i stap long buk bilong God? Elaija i beten long God na i kotim ol Israel. Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, they have killed your prophets, they have broken down your altars; and I am left alone, and they seek my life.”

block.text: "Bikpela, ol i bin kilim i dai ol profet bilong yu. Ol i bin brukim ol alta bilong yu. Na mi wanpela tasol i stap, na nau ol i laik kilim mi tu i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But how does God answer him?

block.text: Tasol God i bekim wanem tok long em? Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have reserved for myself seven thousand men, who have not bowed the knee to Baal.”

block.text: "I gat 7,000 man bilong mi yet i stap, em ol man i no bin brukim skru long giaman god Bal na lotu long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace.

block.text: Olsem tasol nau long dispela taim tu i gat hap lain i stap, God i bin marimari long ol na makim ol bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And if by grace, then it is no longer of works; otherwise grace is no longer grace. But if it is of works, it is no longer grace; otherwise work is no longer work.

block.text: Em i marimari long ol na makim ol. Em i no tingting long wok ol i mekim na em i makim ol. Sapos ol i mekim wok na God i makim ol, orait dispela samting yumi kolim marimari, em i no marimari tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What then? That which Israel seeks for, that he didn’t obtain, but the chosen ones obtained it, and the rest were hardened.
According as it is written,

block.text: Olsem na bai yumi tok wanem? Dispela samting ol Israel i hatwok long kisim, em ol i no bin kisim. God i makim sampela manmeri tasol bilong lain bilong ol, na ol i kisim. Na ol arapela, bel bilong ol i pas pinis,
olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “God gave them a spirit of stupor, eyes that they should not see, and ears that they should not hear, to this very day.”

block.text: "God i mekim ol i stap olsem man i slip i dai tru. Em i mekim ai bilong ol i no inap lukluk, na yau bilong ol i no inap harim tok. Na ol i stap olsem i kam inap nau."

ReferenceBlocks.text: David says,

block.text: Na Devit tu i tok long dispela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let their table be made a snare, and a trap, a stumbling block, and a retribution to them.

block.text: "Taim ol i bung long bikpela kaikai, mi laik bai dispela taim i ken kamap samting bilong bagarapim ol, olsem umben i holimpas abus, na olsem hul ol i ken pundaun long en na olsem ston bilong sutim lek bilong ol, bilong bekim pe nogut long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let their eyes be darkened, that they may not see. Bow down their back always.”

block.text: Mekim ai bilong ol i tudak, bai ol i no inap lukluk moa. Na yu ken bagarapim baksait bilong ol, bai ol i no inap sanap strong. Na ol i ken i stap olsem oltaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: I ask then, did they stumble that they might fall? May it never be! But by their fall salvation has come to the Gentiles, to provoke them to jealousy.

block.text: Olsem na mi laik askim. Taim ol Israel i bin pundaun, ating ol i bagarap na lus olgeta? Nogat tru. Ol i bin givim baksait long God, na long dispela rot God i kisim bek ol arapela lain. God i laik bai ol Israel i lukim dispela gutpela pasin em i mekim long ol arapela lain na bai ol i bel nogut na mangal long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Their disobedience has brought great benefits to the world, and their failure as a people has brought great benefits to those who are not Jewish. So when the Jews participate fully in salvation, the benefits are even greater.

block.text: Taim ol Israel i bin givim baksait long God, God i helpim moa yet olgeta manmeri bilong graun. Na taim ol Israel i lusim pasin bilong God, God i mekim gutpela pasin tru long ol arapela lain. Olsem na sapos olgeta Israel i kam bek long God, yumi save God bai i mekim gutpela pasin moa moa yet long olgeta lain manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I speak to you who are Gentiles. Since then as I am an apostle to Gentiles, I glorify my ministry.

block.text: Orait nau mi laik givim tok long yupela ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain. God i salim mi i go bilong mekim wok namel long yupela, na mi save amamas tru long dispela wok mi mekim,

ReferenceBlocks.text: I do this so that by any means I may provoke to jealousy those who are my flesh, and may save some of them.

block.text: long wanem, mi laik kirapim tingting bilong ol wanlain bilong mi long ol i ken mangalim ol gutpela pasin God i bin mekim long yupela. Na long dispela pasin mi laik kisim bek sampela bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if the rejection of them is the reconciling of the world, what would their acceptance be, but life from the dead?

block.text: Taim God i rausim ol Israel, em i mekim ol manmeri bilong graun i kamap wanbel wantaim em. Olsem na sapos God i kisim bek ol Israel, yumi save em bai i mekim ol manmeri i dai pinis i kirap bek long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If the first fruit is holy, so is the lump. If the root is holy, so are the branches.

block.text: Taim ol i wokim bret long namba wan hap plaua bilong wit, ol i save kisim wanpela bret na givim long God olsem ofa. Na long dispela pasin ol i mekim olgeta arapela bret tu i kamap samting bilong God. Na sapos rop bilong diwai em i bilong God, orait ol han bilong en tu i bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But some of the branches were broken off, and you, being a wild olive, were grafted in among them. You became partakers with them of the root and of the richness of the olive tree.

block.text: Ol Israel i olsem wanpela gutpela diwai oliv, na God i bin brukim na rausim sampela han bilong en. Na yupela ol arapela lain i olsem ol han bilong diwai oliv nating bilong bus, na God i bin kisim yupela na skruim yupela long gutpela diwai oliv bilong kisim ples bilong ol dispela han em i bin brukim. Na nau yupela i save kisim gris long rop bilong gutpela diwai oliv wankain olsem ol arapela han, na yuplea i stap gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t boast over the branches. If you boast, it is not you who support the root, but the root supports you.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i no ken ting yupela i gutpela tru na i winim ol han tru bilong dispela diwai. Sapos yupela i gat tingting olsem, mobeta yupela i tingting gut pastaim. Yupela ol han i no save givim gris long rop bilong diwai. Nogat. Rop i save givim gris long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will say then, “Branches were broken off, that I might be grafted in.”

block.text: Tasol ating yupela bai i tok olsem, "God i bin brukim dispela ol han, bai em i ken skruim mipela long ples bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: True; by their unbelief they were broken off, and you stand by your faith. Don’t be conceited, but fear;

block.text: Tru, God i bin mekim olsem. Tasol as bilong dispela pasin God i bin mekim, em i olsem. Ol i no bilip, olsem na em i brukim ol. Na yupela i bilip, olsem na yupela i stap gut. Olsem na yupela i mas lukaut, nogut yupela i bikhet na apim nem bilong yupela yet. Mobeta yupela i pret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for if God didn’t spare the natural branches, neither will he spare you.

block.text: Tingim. Bipo, God i no larim ol han tru i stap. Na olsem tasol, sapos yupela i bikhet, em bai i no larim yupela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: See then the goodness and severity of God. Toward those who fell, severity; but toward you, goodness, if you continue in his goodness; otherwise you also will be cut off.

block.text: Yupela i mas tingting gut, God i save mekim gutpela pasin na hatpela pasin tu. Ol man i lusim pasin bilong en, em i save mekim save long ol. Tasol em i mekim gutpela pasin long yupela, sapos yupela i stap strong long gutpela pasin bilong en. Sapos nogat, orait em bai i katim yupela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They also, if they don’t continue in their unbelief, will be grafted in, for God is able to graft them in again.

block.text: Na dispela ol arapela han bipo em i bin katim, sapos ol i bilip, orait God bai i skruim ol tu i go bek long diwai. Yes, God em inap long skruim ol i go bek gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if you were cut out of that which is by nature a wild olive tree, and were grafted contrary to nature into a good olive tree, how much more will these, which are the natural branches, be grafted into their own olive tree?

block.text: Yupela i save, bipo yupela i stap han bilong diwai oliv bilong bus, na God i katim yupela na skruim yupela long gutpela diwai oliv, em i no diwai bilong yupela stret. Olsem na tru tumas, em bai inap kisim ol han bilong dispela diwai yet na skruim ol i go bek long dispela diwai pastaim ol i bin i stap long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I don’t desire you to be ignorant, brothers, of this mystery, so that you won’t be wise in your own conceits: A partial hardening has happened to Israel until the fullness of the Gentiles has come in.

block.text: Ol brata, mi laik bai yupela i mas save long wanpela tok hait. Nogut yupela i ting yupela i gat bikpela save tru. Olsem na mi autim dispela tok hait long yupela. Em i olsem. Bel na tingting bilong hap lain bilong ol Israel i pas pinis, na ol bai i stap olsem i go inap long dispela taim ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain ol inapim dispela namba God i bin makim pinis long hamas bilong ol bai i stap insait long lain manmeri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then all Israel will be saved. Even as it is written,

block.text: Na long dispela rot God bai i kisim bek olgeta Israel, olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “There will come out of Zion the Deliverer, and he will turn away ungodliness from Jacob.

block.text: "Man bilong sambai long ol Israel na helpim ol, em bai i kirap long Jerusalem na i kam, na em bai i mekim olgeta manmeri bilong lain bilong Jekop i lusim pasin bilong sakim tok bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is my covenant to them, when I will take away their sins.”

block.text: Na long dispela taim bai mi mekim kontrak wantaim ol long pinisim tru ol sin bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Concerning the Good News, they are enemies for your sake. But concerning the election, they are beloved for the fathers’ sake.

block.text: Ol Israel i bin givim baksait long gutnius bilong Jisas, olsem na ol i stap olsem birua bilong God, na dispela i helpim yupela ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain. Tasol bipo yet God i makim ol long i stap ol manmeri bilong en, na em i laikim ol yet. Em i ting long ol tumbuna bilong ol na em i mekim olsem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the gifts and the calling of God are irrevocable.

block.text: Sapos God i singautim ol man i kam long em, na em i givim ol gutpela samting long ol, orait bihain em i no save senisim tingting bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in time past you were disobedient to God, but now you have obtained mercy by their disobedience.

block.text: Bipo yupela i save sakim tok bilong God, tasol nau ol Israel i sakim tok, na long dispela rot yupela i bin kisim marimari bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The jews also have now been disobedient. By the mercy shown to you they may also obtain mercy some day.

block.text: Olsem tasol, nau ol Israel i sakim tok bilong God, tasol long dispela marimari yupela i bin kisim, nau ol tu i ken kisim marimari bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For God has shut up all to disobedience, that he might have mercy on all.

block.text: God i bin larim pasin bilong sakim tok i kalabusim olgeta man, long wanem, em i laik soim marimari bilong en long olgeta man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Oh the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and the knowledge of God! How unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past tracing out!

block.text: Olaman! Ol gutpela pasin bilong God na tingting na save bilong en i pulap tru, na i daun tumas olsem solwara! Yumi man i no inap tru long painim as bilong olgeta tingting bilong en. Yumi no inap tru long bihainim olgeta rot bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “For who has known the mind of the Lord? Or who has been his counselor?”

block.text: Olsem tok i stap long buk bilong God, "Husat i save pinis long tingting bilong Bikpela? Husat i bin givim tingting long em?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Or who has first given to him, and it will be repaid to him again?”

block.text: Na "husat i bin givim samting long God pastaim na bai God i mas bekim samting long em?" Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things. To him be the glory for ever! Amen.

block.text: God yet i mekim kamap olgeta samting, na em i as bilong olgeta samting. Na olgeta samting i bilong em wanpela tasol. Yumi mas litimapim nem bilong em oltaim oltaim. I tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ROMANS 12
Therefore I urge you, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable to God, which is your spiritual service.

block.text: Ol brata, mi tingting long bikpela marimari bilong God na mi tokaut strong long yupela olsem. Yupela i mas givim bodi bilong yupela long God olsem ofa. Na taim yupela i stap laip bai yupela i stap ol manmeri bilong God stret na bai yupela i mekim ol pasin God i laikim. Yupela i mekim olsem na yupela i ken lotu tru long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. That way you may prove what is the good, well-pleasing, and perfect will of God.

block.text: Na yupela i no ken wokabaut wankain olsem ol man bilong dispela graun. Nogat. Yupela i mas larim God i mekim tingting bilong yupela i kamap nupela na bai pasin bilong yupela i kamap nupela tu. Olsem na bai yupela inap long save tru long laik bilong God. Bai yupela i save long ol pasin i gutpela na long ol pasin God i laikim tumas na long ol pasin i inap tru na i stret olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I say, through the grace that was given me, to every man who is among you: Do not think of yourself more highly than you ought, but rather think reasonably, as God has apportioned to each of you a measure of faith.

block.text: Long marimari bilong en God i bin makim mi bilong mekim wok bilong en, olsem na mi laik givim dispela tok lukaut long yupela olgeta wan wan. Yupela i no ken ting save na pasin bilong yupela i winim ol arapela. Nogat. Yupela i mas skelim gut ol pasin bilong yupela yet na tingting stret, inap long mak bilong bilip God i givim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we have many members in one body, and all the members don’t have the same function.

block.text: Yumi save, wanpela bodi i gat planti hap bilong en, na olgeta hap i no mekim wankain wok tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the same way, we who are many, are one body in Christ, and individually members one of another.

block.text: Olsem tasol yumi tu yumi planti manmeri, tasol long Krais yumi stap olsem wanpela bodi tasol. Na yumi olgeta wan wan yumi stap olsem poroman bilong ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We each have gifts differing according to the grace that was given to us. If we have been given prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of our faith;

block.text: Long marimari bilong en God i bin givim yumi narakain narakain save, olsem presen em i givim yumi. Olsem na sapos wanpela man i gat save bilong autim tok olsem profet, orait em i mas autim tok inap long mak bilong bilip bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: if service, let us give ourselves to service; or he who teaches, to his teaching;

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i gat save bilong helpim ol arapela manmeri bilong God, orait em i mas mekim tru wok bilong helpim ol. Sapos man i gat save bilong mekim wok tisa, orait em i mas mekim tru wok tisa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: or he who exhorts, to his exhorting: he who gives, let him do it with liberality; he who rules, with diligence; he who shows mercy, with cheerfulness.

block.text: Sapos man i gat save bilong strongim bel na tingting bilong ol man, orait em i mas mekim tru wok bilong strongim bel na tingting bilong ol. Man i givim ol samting long helpim ol manmeri i sot, orait em i mas givim planti long ol. Man i bosim wanpela wok, em i mas wok strong long bosim gut dispela wok. Man i sori long ol arapela na i helpim ol, em i mas amamas na helpim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let love be without hypocrisy. Abhor that which is evil. Cling to that which is good.

block.text: Yupela i mas givim bel bilong yupela tru long ol arapela. Yupela i no ken giaman. Nogat. Yupela i mas laikim ol tru. Yupela i mas givim baksait tru long pasin nogut, na yupela i mas pas tru long gutpela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In love of the brothers be tenderly affectionate one to another; in honor preferring one another.

block.text: Yupela i mas givim bel bilong yupela long ol arapela manmeri bilong God, na laikim ol tru olsem ol brata bilong yupela stret. Yupela i mas strong long litimapim nem bilong ol arapela tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do not lag in diligence. Be fervent in spirit; serving the Lord.

block.text: Yupela i mas wok strong oltaim na larim Holi Spirit i kirapim yupela long mekim wok bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Rejoice in hope; endure in troubles; continue steadfastly in prayer.

block.text: Yupela i save bilip na wetim Bikpela i mekim gut long yupela, olsem na yupela i mas amamas. Sapos hevi i kamap long yupela, orait yupela i mas sanap strong. Na yupela i mas beten long olgeta taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: contribute to the needs of the saints; give to hospitality.

block.text: Sapos sampela manmeri bilong God i sot long ol samting, orait yupela i mas helpim ol. Sapos ol man bilong narapela ples ol i kamap long yupela, orait yupela i mas lukautim ol gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Bless those who persecute you; bless, and don’t curse.

block.text: Sapos ol man i mekim nogut long yupela, orait yupela i mas prea long God i ken mekim gut long ol. Yes, yupela i mas prea long em i mekim gut long ol. Yupela i no ken prea long em i bagarapim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Rejoice with those who rejoice. Weep with those who weep.

block.text: Yupela i mas amamas wantaim ol man i amamas. Na yupela i mas krai wantaim ol man i krai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be of the same mind one toward another. Don’t set your mind on high things, but associate with the humble. Don’t be wise in your own conceits.

block.text: Yupela i mas mekim wankain pasin long olgeta manmeri. Yupela i no ken ting yupela i mas i stap bikman. Nogat. Yupela i mas amamas long i stap wantaim ol man nating tu. Yupela i no ken apim nem bilong yupela yet na tok, "Mi tasol mi gat save."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Repay no one evil for evil. Respect what is honorable in the sight of all men.

block.text: Sapos ol i mekim pasin nogut long yupela, orait yupela i no ken bekim pasin nogut long ol. Nogat. Oltaim yupela i mas tingting long mekim pasin i gutpela long ai bilong olgeta man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If it is possible, as much as it is up to you, be at peace with all men.

block.text: Yupela yet i no ken tingting long kros na pait. Oltaim yupela i mas painim rot bilong i stap wanbel wantaim olgeta man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t seek revenge yourselves, beloved, but give place to God’s wrath. For it is written,

block.text: Ol pren tru bilong mi, yupela yet i no ken bekim rong ol i mekim long yupela. Yupela i mas larim God i belhat long ol. Yupela i save, buk bilong God i gat tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Vengeance belongs to me; I will repay, says the Lord.”

block.text: "Bekim rong, em i wok bilong mi. Mi yet bai mi bekim rong bilong ol na mekim save long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore
“If your enemy is hungry, feed him. If he is thirsty, give him a drink; for in doing so, you will heap coals of fire on his head.”

block.text: Tasol sapos birua bilong yu em i hangre, orait yu mas givim kaikai long em. Sapos em i dai long wara, orait yu mas givim wara long em. Sapos yu mekim olsem, bai yu mekim em i sem tru long ol pasin nogut bilong em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.

block.text: Yu no ken larim pasin nogut i winim yu. Nogat. Yu mas mekim gutpela pasin na bai yu daunim pasin nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ROMANS 13
Let every soul be in subjection to the higher authorities, for there is no authority except from God, and those who exist are ordained by God.

block.text: Olgeta man i mas i stap aninit long ol gavman. Yumi save, i no gat wanpela gavman i kamap nating. Nogat. Olgeta wok bilong gavman i kamap long han bilong God tasol. Na olgeta gavman i stap, God yet i putim ol na ol i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore he who resists the authority, withstands the ordinance of God; and those who withstand will receive to themselves damnation.

block.text: Olsem na ol man i sakim tok bilong gavman, ol i sakim tok bilong ol man God yet i bin putim long wok bilong ol. Na ol man i mekim olsem, ol bai i kisim pe nogut long pasin ol i mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For rulers are not a terror for those who do right, but for those who do wrong. Do you desire to have no fear of those in authority? Do that which is right and they will commend you.

block.text: Ol gavman i no i stap bilong pretim ol man i mekim gutpela pasin. Ol i stap bilong pretim ol man i mekim pasin nogut. Olsem na sapos yu no laik pret long gavman, orait yu mas mekim gutpela pasin tasol, na em bai i litimapim nem bilong yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A leader is a servant of God to you for good. But if you do that which is evil, be afraid, for he doesn’t bear the sword in vain; for he is a servant of God, an avenger for wrath to him who does evil.

block.text: Gavman em i wokman bilong God, bilong helpim yu na mekim yu i stap gut. Tasol sapos yu mekim pasin nogut, orait yu mas pret. Yu save, gavman i holim bainat, na em i no holim nating. Em i wokman bilong God, bilong bekim pe nogut long man i mekim pasin nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore you need to be in subjection, not only because of the wrath, but also for conscience’ sake.

block.text: Olsem na yumi mas aninit long gavman. Na yumi no ken pret long dispela pe nogut tasol na bihainim tok bilong em. Nogat. Yumi mas save long bel bilong yumi yet olsem dispela pasin i stret, olsem na yumi bihainim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this reason you also pay taxes, for they are servants of God’s service, attending continually on this very thing.

block.text: Long dispela as tasol yupela i save tromoi takis tu, long wanem, ol gavman i stap wokman bilong God, na oltaim ol i save strong long lukautim dispela wok God i givim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Give therefore to everyone what you owe: taxes to whom taxes are due; customs to whom customs; respect to whom respect; honor to whom honor.

block.text: Wanem samting yupela i mas givim long gavman, orait yupela givim long ol. Yupela i mas givim ol kain kain takis long man bilong kisim takis. Na sapos yupela i stap aninit long wanpela man, orait yupela i mas harim tok na soim gutpela pasin long em. Na sapos man i stap bikman, orait yupela i mas givim biknem long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Owe no one anything, except to love one another; for he who loves his neighbor has fulfilled the law.

block.text: Owe no one anything, except to love one another; for he who loves his neighbor has fulfilled the law.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the commandments, “You shall not commit adultery,” “You shall not murder,” “You shall not steal,” “You shall not give false testimony,” “You shall not covet,” and whatever other commandments there are, are all summed up in this saying, namely, “You shall love your neighbor as yourself.”

block.text: For the commandments, "Yupela i no ken kilim manmeri i dai. Yupela i no ken stil. Yupela i no ken mangalim samting bilong narapela man. Yupela ol marit, yupela i no ken mekim pasin pamuk." Ol dispela lo, na olgeta arapela lo i stap, em olgeta i stap insait long dispela wanpela tok, "Yu mas laikim tru ol arapela man olsem yu laikim yu yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Love doesn’t harm a neighbor. Love therefore is the fulfillment of the law.

block.text: Man i save givim bel bilong em long arapela man, em i no save mekim pasin nogut long em. Olsem na man i save givim bel bilong em long ol arapela, em i save bihainim tru lo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do this, knowing the time, that it is already time for you to awaken out of sleep, for salvation is now nearer to us than when we first believed.

block.text: Mi tokim yupela long mekim ol dispela pasin, long wanem, yupela i save pinis long dispela taim nau yumi stap long en. Nau em i taim bilong yupela i lusim slip na kirap. Yupela i save, long taim yumi kamap manmeri bilong bilip long Krais, orait taim bilong God i laik kisim bek yumi, em i bin i stap longwe yet. Tasol nau dispela taim em i kamap klostu liklik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The night is far gone, and the day is near. Let’s therefore throw off the works of darkness, and let’s put on the armor of light.

block.text: Nait i laik pinis, na klostu tulait i laik kamap. Olsem na mobeta yumi lusim olgeta pasin bilong tudak, na kisim ol samting bilong lait olsem man i pasim ol klos samting bilong pait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let us walk properly, as in the day; not in reveling and drunkenness, not in sexual promiscuity and lustful acts, and not in strife and jealousy.

block.text: Yumi mas wokabaut stret, olsem man i wokabaut long san. Yumi no ken hambak nabaut na spak. Yumi no ken mekim pasin pamuk na pilai nabaut long pasin doti. Yumi no ken kros nabaut na bel nogut long ol arapela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But put on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make no provision for the flesh, for its lusts.

block.text: Yupela i mas kisim Bikpela Jisas Krais na pasim em olsem klos pait bilong yupela. Na yupela i no ken tingting long bihainim laik nogut bilong bodi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ROMANS 14
Now accept one who is weak in faith, but not for disputes over opinions.

block.text: Man i bilip, tasol bilip bilong en i no strong, em yupela i mas kisim i kam insait long sios. Tasol yupela i no ken pait long toktok wantaim em long ol kain kain samting yumi no klia tumas long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One man has faith to eat all things, but he who is weak eats only vegetables.

block.text: Wanpela man i strong long bilip, na em i save kaikai olgeta kain samting. Tasol bilip bilong narapela man em i no strong, olsem na em i no save kaikai mit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t let him who eats despise him who doesn’t eat. Don’t let him who doesn’t eat judge him who eats, for God has accepted him.

block.text: Na man i save kaikai olgeta samting, em i no ken tingting nogut long man i no save kaikai mit. Na man i no save kaikai mit, em i no ken ting man i save kaikai olgeta samting em i mekim sin. Nogat. God i bin kisim dispela man tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Who are you who judge another’s servant? To his own lord he stands or falls. Yes, he will be made to stand, for God has power to make him stand.

block.text: Yu husat na yu skelim pasin bilong wokboi bilong narapela man? Sapos em i sanap strong long wok bilong en, o sapos em i pundaun, dispela em i samting bilong Bikman bilong em yet. Tasol em bai i sanap strong, long wanem, Bikpela yet inap long strongim em na mekim em i sanap strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One man esteems one day as more important. Another esteems every day alike. Let each man be fully assured in his own mind.

block.text: Wanpela man i ting wanpela de em i bikpela moa na i winim ol arapela de. Na narapela man i ting olgeta de i wankain tasol. Tasol olgeta man wan wan ol i mas save gut long wanem tingting em i stret long bel bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who observes the day, observes it to the Lord; and he who does not observe the day, to the Lord he does not observe it. He who eats, eats to the Lord, for he gives God thanks. He who doesn’t eat, to the Lord he doesn’t eat, and gives God thanks.

block.text: Man i makim wanpela de olsem bikpela de bilong lotu, dispela man i save tingting long Bikpela na i mekim olsem. Na man i save kaikai olgeta samting, dispela man i save tingting long Bikpela na i kaikai, long wanem, em i save tenkyu long God na i kaikai. Na man i no save kaikai olgeta samting, em i save tingting long Bikpela na i tambuim sampela kaikai. Na em tu i save tenkyu long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For none of us lives to himself, and none dies to himself.

block.text: Yumi save, namel long yumi i no gat wanpela man i save ting laip bilong en em i samting bilong em yet. Na i no gat wanpela em i save ting dai bilong en em i samting bilong em yet. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if we live, we live to the Lord. Or if we die, we die to the Lord. If therefore we live or die, we are the Lord’s.

block.text: Sapos yumi stap laip, em i samting bilong Bikpela. Na sapos yumi dai, em tu i samting bilong Bikpela. Olsem na sapos yumi stap laip, o sapos yumi dai, yumi bilong Bikpela tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For to this end Christ died, rose, and lived again, that he might be Lord of both the dead and the living.

block.text: Na Krais tu i dai na i kisim laip gen bai em i ken i stap Bikpela bilong ol man i dai pinis na bilong ol man i stap laip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you, why do you judge your brother? Or you again, why do you despise your brother? For we will all stand before the judgment seat of Christ.
For it is written,

block.text: Yu, bilong wanem yu skelim pasin bilong brata bilong yu na tok nogut long em? Na yu, bilong wanem yu tok bilas long brata bilong yu? Yupela i save, bai yumi olgeta i sanap long kot bilong God.
Em i olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “‘As I live,’ says the Lord, ‘to me every knee will bow. Every tongue will confess to God.’”

block.text: "Mi Bikpela, mi save stap oltaim, mi tok tru tumas, olgeta manmeri bilong graun bai i kam long mi na brukim skru long mi. Na olgeta bilong ol bai i tokaut olsem, mi God tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then each one of us will give account of himself to God.

block.text: Olsem na yumi save, yumi olgeta wan wan bai yumi mas tokim God long as bilong olgeta pasin yumi bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore let’s not judge one another any more. But judge this rather, that no man put a stumbling block in his brother’s way, or an occasion for falling.

block.text: Olsem na yumi mas lusim pasin bilong skelim pasin bilong ol arapela brata na tingting nogut long ol. Yumi mas bihainim narapela tingting, em long yumi no ken mekim wanpela samting bilong mekim brata i pundaun na mekim sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know, and am persuaded in the Lord Jesus, that nothing is unclean of itself; Except that to him who considers anything to be unclean, to him it is unclean.

block.text: Bikpela Jisas i bin mekim tingting bilong mi i klia, na mi save gut olsem, i no gat wanpela samting em yet i doti long ai bilong God. Tasol sapos man i ting wanpela samting i doti, orait long laip bilong dispela man dispela samting i stap doti tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yet if because of food your brother is grieved, you walk no longer in love. Don’t destroy with your food him for whom Christ died.

block.text: Olsem na sapos yu kaikai wanpela samting brata bilong yu i ting em i doti long ai bilong God, na long dispela pasin yu bagarapim tingting bilong dispela brata, orait yu ken save, long dispela pasin yu no givim bel bilong yu long brata. Krais i dai pinis bilong kisim bek dispela brata, na yu no ken larim kaikai bilong yu i bagarapim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then don’t let your good be slandered,

block.text: Sapos yupela i ting wanpela samting em i gutpela, orait yupela i mas lukaut, nogut pasin bilong yupela yet i mekim na ol arapela man i tok dispela samting i nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for the Kingdom of God is not eating and drinking, but righteousness, peace, and joy in the Holy Spirit.

block.text: Kingdom bilong God i no pas long kaikai na dring. Nogat. Pasin tru bilong kingdom bilong God em i stretpela pasin na bel isi na pasin bilong amamas Holi Spirit i save kamapim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he who serves Christ in these things is acceptable to God and approved by men.

block.text: Man i bihainim dispela pasin na i mekim wok bilong Krais, bai God i laikim pasin bilong em, na bai ol man i tok amamas long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then, let us follow after things which make for peace, and things by which we may build one another up.

block.text: Olsem na yumi mas bihainim olgeta pasin i save mekim yumi i stap wanbel, na olgeta pasin i save strongim bilip bilong ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t overthrow God’s work for food’s sake. All things indeed are clean, however it is evil for that man who creates a stumbling block by eating.

block.text: Yu no ken tingting long kaikai tasol na bagarapim wok bilong God. Tru, olgeta samting i gutpela bilong kaikai. Tasol sapos yu kaikai wanpela samting na dispela i mekim narapela man i pundaun, orait yu mekim pasin nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is good to not eat meat, drink wine, nor do anything by which your brother stumbles, is offended, or is made weak.

block.text: Sapos yu kaikai mit o yu dring wain o yu mekim narapela samting, na dispela i mekim brata bilong yu i pundaun, orait mobeta yu no mekim dispela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do you have faith? Have it to yourself before God. Happy is he who doesn’t judge himself in that which he approves.

block.text: Bilip bilong yu i kamapim wanem tingting long ol dispela samting, em i samting bilong yu yet wantaim God. Man i ting wanpela samting em i gutpela, na bel bilong en i no kotim em long dispela samting, em i ken amamas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he who doubts is damned if he eats, because it isn’t of faith; and whatever is not of faith is sin.

block.text: Tasol man i kaikai mit samting long taim em i gat tupela tingting long pasin em i mekim, em i gat asua, long wanem, em i no save, bilip bilong en i orait long dispela pasin, o nogat. Sapos yumi mekim wanpela pasin bilip bilong yumi i no orait long en, orait yumi mekim sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now to him who is able to establish you according to my Good News and the preaching of Jesus Christ. And this according to the revelation of the mystery which has been kept secret through long ages,

block.text: Now to him who is able to establish you according to my Good News and the preaching of Jesus Christ. And this according to the revelation of the mystery which has been kept secret through long ages,

ReferenceBlocks.text: but now is revealed, and by the Scriptures of the prophets. According to the commandment of the eternal God, it is made known for obedience of faith to all the nations;

block.text: but now is revealed, and by the Scriptures of the prophets. According to the commandment of the eternal God, it is made known for obedience of faith to all the nations;

ReferenceBlocks.text: to the only wise God, through Jesus Christ, to whom be the glory forever! Amen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ROMANS 15
Now we who are strong ought to bear the weaknesses of the weak, and not to please ourselves.

block.text: Yumi man i gat strongpela bilip, yumi gat wok bilong helpim ol man i no gat strongpela bilip na karim hevi bilong ol. Yumi no ken ting long helpim yumi yet tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let each one of us please his neighbor for that which is good, to be building him up.

block.text: Yumi olgeta wan wan yumi mas wok long helpim ol brata, bai ol i ken kisim gutpela pasin na bilip bilong ol i ken kamap strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For even Christ didn’t please himself. But, as it is written,

block.text: Yumi save, Krais tu i no bin ting long helpim em yet tasol. Pasin i kamap long em olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The reproaches of those who reproached you fell on me.”

block.text: "Ol man i bin tok nogut long yu, na dispela tok nogut bilong ol i pundaun antap long mi tu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For whatever things were written before were written for our learning. That through patience and through encouragement of the Scriptures we might have hope.

block.text: Olgeta tok bipo ol i bin raitim long buk bilong God, em ol i bin raitim bilong skulim yumi. Dispela tok i bilong strongim bel bilong yumi na mekim yumi sanap strong na wetim God i kisim yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the God of patience and of encouragement grant you to be of the same mind one with another according to Christ Jesus,

block.text: Yumi save kisim strong long God wanpela tasol na em wanpela i save mekim yumi sanap strong long bilip. Orait God i ken helpim yupela long bihainim tru pasin bilong Krais Jisas na holim dispela wanpela tingting tasol. Olsem na bai yupela i stap wanbel,

ReferenceBlocks.text: that with one accord you may with one mouth glorify the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: na bai yupela olgeta wantaim i litimapim nem bilong God, em i God na Papa bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore accept one another, even as Christ also accepted you, to the glory of God.

block.text: Olsem na yupela olgeta i mas amamas long kisim ol arapela Kristen i kam i stap wantaim yupela, olsem Krais tu i bin amamas long yupela i ken i stap wantaim em. Na long dispela pasin bai yupela i kamapim biknem bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I say that Jesus Christ has been made a servant of the circumcision for the truth of God, that he might confirm the promises given to the fathers,

block.text: Mi tok olsem, Krais i bin kamap wokman bilong helpim ol lain Juda. Em i mekim olsem bilong soim olsem tok bilong God i tru, na long dispela pasin em inapim olgeta promis God i bin givim long ol tumbuna bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy. As it is written,

block.text: Na tu, em i laik bai ol arapela lain i lukim marimari bilong God na litimapim nem bilong em, olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Therefore will I give praise to you among the Gentiles, and sing to your name.”

block.text: "Olsem na bai mi litimapim nem bilong yu namel long ol arapela lain manmeri. Na bai mi mekim song bilong litimapim nem bilong yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again he says,

block.text: Na narapela tok bilong buk bilong God i olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rejoice, you Gentiles, with his people.”

block.text: "Yupela ol manmeri bilong ol arapela kantri, yupela i ken amamas wantaim ol manmeri bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again,

block.text: Na long narapela hap em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Praise the Lord, all you Gentiles! Let all the peoples praise him.”

block.text: "Yupela olgeta lain pipel, litimapim nem bilong Bikpela. Yupela manmeri bilong olgeta kantri, litimapim nem bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again, Isaiah says,

block.text: Na Aisaia tu i bin tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “There will be the root of Jesse, he who arises to rule over the Gentiles; in him the Gentiles will hope.”

block.text: "Nupela king long lain bilong Jesi bai i kamap, na em bai i bosim olgeta lain manmeri. Ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain i wetim taim em bai i kamap na mekim gut long ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope, in the power of the Holy Spirit.

block.text: God i bin promis long givim yumi ol dispela gutpela samting yumi wet long kisim. Yupela i save bilip long em, na em i ken mekim bikpela amamas na bel isi i kamap na i pulap long yupela. Na long strong bilong Holi Spirit, pasin bilong wetim taim God bai i givim ol dispela gutpela samting long yumi, em i ken pulap tru long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I myself am also persuaded about you, my brothers, that you yourselves are full of goodness. You are filled with all knowledge, able also to admonish others.

block.text: Ol brata bilong mi, long bel bilong mi mi bilip tru long yupela i save mekim gutpela pasin oltaim. Na yupela i gat olgeta kain save, olsem na yupela wan wan yupela inap long givim gutpela tingting long ol arapela manmeri bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I write the more boldly to you in part, as reminding you, because of the grace that was given to me by God.

block.text: Tasol sampela tok mi raitim long yupela, em i strongpela tok liklik. Tasol mi no surik long raitim. Nogat. Mi laik kirapim tingting bilong yupela, long wanem, God i bin marimari long mi na makim mi

ReferenceBlocks.text: That I should be a servant of Christ Jesus to the Gentiles, serving as a priest the Good News of God, that the offering up of the Gentiles might be made acceptable, sanctified by the Holy Spirit.

block.text: long i stap wokman bilong Krais Jisas, bilong mekim wok namel long ol arapela lain manmeri. Long dispela wok mi mekim bilong autim gutnius bilong God, mi stap olsem pris, na mi laik bringim ol arapela lain i kam long God olsem ofa em i laikim tumas. Na Holi Spirit i ken mekim ol i kamap lain manmeri tru bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have therefore my boasting in Christ Jesus in things pertaining to God.

block.text: Olsem na mi wok wantaim Krais Jisas na mi amamas long dispela wok mi mekim long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I will not dare to speak of any things except those which Christ worked through me, for the obedience of the Gentiles, by word and deed,

block.text: Mi no ken tokaut long narapela samting. Nogat. Mi laik tokaut long dispela wanpela samting tasol. Mi laik stori long wok Krais i bin mekim long han bilong mi. Em i bin helpim toktok bilong mi na mekim ol gutpela wok long han bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: in the power of signs and wonders, in the power of God’s Spirit; so that from Jerusalem, and around as far as to Illyricum, I have fully preached the Good News of Christ;

block.text: Na em i bin givim mi strong bilong wokim kain kain mirakel. Na Spirit bilong God tu i bin wok strong long mi. Dispela olgeta samting Krais i mekim bilong kirapim ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain long bihainim tok bilong God. Olsem na mi stat long Jerusalem na mi autim olgeta tok bilong gutnius bilong Krais, na mi raun i go long olgeta hap inap long provins Ilirikum.

ReferenceBlocks.text: yes, making it my aim to preach the Good News, not where Christ was already named, that I might not build on another’s foundation.
But, as it is written,

block.text: Long dispela wok mi save laikim tumas long autim gutnius long ol ples ol manmeri i no save yet long nem bilong Krais. Mi no laik wokim haus antap long pos narapela man i bin sanapim.
Nogat. Mi laik mekim olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “They will see, to whom no news of him came. They who haven’t heard will understand.”

block.text: "Ol man i no bin harim stori long en bipo, bai ol i lukim em. Na ol man I no bin harim tok bilong en, bai ol i save gut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore also I was hindered these many times from coming to you.

block.text: Dispela wok i bin pasim mi planti taim, na mi no inap i kam lukim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now, no longer having any place in these regions, and having these many years a longing to come to you,

block.text: Tasol nau mi no gat wok moa long dispela hap. Na planti yia mi bin laikim tumas long lukim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: when I journey to Spain, I will come to you. For I hope to see you on my journey, and to be helped on my way there by you, if first I may enjoy your company for a while.

block.text: Olsem na taim mi go long kantri Spen, mi ting long i kam lukim yupela pastaim na mi go. Bai mi amamas long lukim yupela na stap liklik wantaim yupela. Na bihain mi laik bai yupela i ken helpim mi long i go long Spen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now, I say, I am going to Jerusalem, serving the saints.

block.text: Tasol nau mi laik i go long Jerusalem bilong helpim ol manmeri bilong God i stap long dispela hap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it has been the good pleasure of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor among the saints who are at Jerusalem.

block.text: Ol manmeri bilong God i stap long provins Masedonia na Akaia, ol i pasim tok na bungim pinis sampela mani ol i laik salim i go long Jerusalem, bilong helpim ol manmeri bilong God i sot long ol samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, it has been their good pleasure, and they are their debtors. For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things, they owe it to them also to serve them in fleshly things.

block.text: Ol i bin givim dispela mani long laik bilong ol yet, na dispela pasin i gutpela, long wanem, ol i gat samting olsem dinau bilong bekim long ol Juda. Ol Juda i bin bringim ol gutpela samting bilong God i kam long ol arapela lain. Olsem na ol arapela lain i gat wok bilong helpim ol Juda long ol samting bilong bodi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When therefore I have accomplished this, and have sealed to them this fruit, I will go on by way of you to Spain.

block.text: Orait mi laik pinisim dispela wok pastaim. Mi laik bringim dispela mani i go long ol Jerusalem, na bihain, taim mi go long Spen, bai mi kam lukim yupela pastaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know that, when I come to you, I will come in the fullness of the blessing of the Good News of Christ.

block.text: Na mi save pinis, sapos mi kam long yupela, blesing bilong Krais bai i pulap long mi, na em bai i mekim gut tru long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I beg you, brothers, by our Lord Jesus Christ, and by the love of the Spirit, that you strive together with me in your prayers to God for me,

block.text: Ol brata, mi laik bai yupela i tingting long Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais, na long dispela pasin bilong givim bel bilong yumi long ol arapela, em Holi Spirit i save kamapim long yumi. Na mi laik bai dispela tingting i ken kirapim yupela long mekim hatwok wantaim mi long prea. Yupela i mas prea long God i ken helpim mi

ReferenceBlocks.text: that I may be delivered from those who are disobedient in Judea, and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be acceptable to the saints;

block.text: na kisim bek mi long han bilong ol dispela man bilong Judia i save sakim tok bilong God. Na yupela i mas prea long God i ken mekim ol manmeri bilong en long Jerusalem i laikim dispela wok mi mekim bilong helpim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: that I may come to you in joy through the will of God, and together with you, find rest.

block.text: Olsem na sapos God i laik, mi ken amamas tru long taim mi kam lukim yupela, na mi ken malolo liklik wantaim yupela na kisim strong gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the God of peace be with you all. Amen.

block.text: God bilong givim gutpela sindaun na bel isi long yumi, em i ken i stap wantaim yupela olgeta. I tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ROMANS 16
I commend to you Phoebe, our sister, who is a servant of the assembly that is at Cenchreae.

block.text: Mi laik bai yupela i mekim gut long Fibi, dispela susa bilong yumi. Em i gat wok bilong helpim sios bilong taun Senkria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Receive her in the Lord, in a way worthy of the saints, and assist her in whatever matter she may need from you. She herself also has been a helper of many, and of my own self.

block.text: Mi laik bai yupela i tingting long Bikpela na kisim Fibi i stap wantaim yupela. Em i gutpela pasin yumi ol manmeri bilong God i mas mekim. Na sapos em i gat hevi long wanpela samting, orait mi laik bai yupela i helpim em, long wanem, em i bin helpim planti manmeri, na em i bin helpim mi tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Prisca and Aquila, my fellow workers in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Prisila na Akwila, tupela wanwok bilong mi long wok bilong Krais Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They almost died for me. I and all the assemblies of the Gentiles give thanks for them.

block.text: Tupela i bin redi long i dai bilong helpim mi. Olsem na i no mi tasol i tenkyu long tupela. Nogat. Olgeta sios bilong ol arapela lain manmeri, ol tu i save tenkyu long tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet the assembly that is in their house. Greet Epaenetus, my beloved, who is the first fruits of Achaia to Christ.

block.text: Na yupela givim gude bilong mi long ol manmeri bilong sios i save bung long haus bilong tupela. Em i kamap Kristen paslain long olgeta man bilong provins Esia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Mary, who labored much for us.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Maria. Em i bin mekim planti hatwok bilong helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Andronicus and Junia, my relatives and my fellow prisoners, who are notable among the apostles, who also were in Christ before me.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Andronikus wantaim Junias. Tupela i wanlain bilong mi na i bin kalabus wantaim mi. Tupela i gat nem namel long ol aposel, na tupela i bin i stap long lain bilong Krais paslain long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Amplias, my beloved in the Lord.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Ampliatus. Em i pren tru bilong mi long pasin bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Urbanus, our fellow worker in Christ, and Stachys, my beloved.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Urbanus, em i wanwok bilong yumi long wok bilong Krais. Na givim gude long Stakis tu, em i pren tru bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Apelles, the approved in Christ. Greet those who are of the household of Aristobulus.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Apeles, em i gat nem long em i bihainim Krais tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Herodion, my kinsman. Greet them of the household of Narcissus, who are in the Lord.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Herodion, em i wanlain bilong mi. Narsisus i stap long lain bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Tryphaena and Tryphosa, who labor in the Lord. Greet Persis, the beloved, who labored much in the Lord.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Trifina wantaim Trifosa. Tupela i save hatwok long mekim wok bilong Bikpela. Em i bin hatwok long mekim wok bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Rufus, the chosen in the Lord, and his mother and mine.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Rufus, em i gutpela man bilong bihainim Bikpela, na long mama bilong en tu. Em i bin i stap olsem mama bilong mi tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas, and the brothers who are with them.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Asinkritus na Flegon na Hermes na Patrobas na Hermas, na long ol brata i stap wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Philologus and Julia, Nereus and his sister, and Olympas, and all the saints who are with them.

block.text: Yupela givim gude bilong mi long Filologus wantaim Julia, na long Nereus wantaim susa bilong en, na long Olimpas, na long olgeta manmeri bilong God i save stap wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet one another with a holy kiss. The assemblies of Christ greet you.

block.text: Long pasin bilong yumi manmeri bilong God, yupela olgeta wan wan i mas givim kis long ol brata.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I beg you, brothers, look out for those who are causing the divisions and occasions of stumbling, contrary to the doctrine which you learned, and turn away from them.

block.text: Ol brata, mi laik tok strong long yupela i mas lukaut gut long ol man i save sakim dispela tok yupela i bin kisim na i save mekim ol kain kain toktok na ol pasin bilong brukim sios. Long dispela pasin ol i save mekim ol manmeri bilong sios i pundaun na bagarap. Yupela i mas i stap longwe long ol dispela kain man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For those who are such don’t serve our Lord, Jesus Christ, but their own belly; and by their smooth and flattering speech, they deceive the hearts of the innocent.

block.text: Ol i no save mekim wok bilong Krais, Bikpela bilong yumi. Nogat. Ol i save bihainim laik bilong bodi bilong ol yet tasol. Na long switpela tok na long tok gris bilong ol, ol i save giamanim ol man i no save gut long wanem ol pasin i gutpela na wanem pasin i nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For your obedience has become known to all. I rejoice therefore over you. But I desire to have you wise in that which is good, but innocent in that which is evil.

block.text: Yupela i save bihainim tok bilong God, na olgeta man i harim pinis tok long dispela pasin bilong yupela. Olsem na mi amamas long yupela. Tasol mi laik bai yupela i ken save tru long ol gutpela pasin, na yupela i no gat save long ol pasin nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And the God of peace will quickly crush Satan under your feet. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

block.text: Na long liklik taim, God bilong givim gutpela sindaun na bel isi long yumi, em bai i larim yupela i krungutim Satan aninit long lek bilong yupela. yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Timothy, my fellow worker, greets you, as do Lucius, Jason, and Sosipater, my relatives.

block.text: Wanwok bilong mi, Timoti, em i salim gude long yupela. Na Lusius na Jeson na Sosipater, ol wanlain bilong mi, ol tu i salim gude long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I, Tertius, who write the letter, greet you in the Lord.

block.text: Mi Tertius, mi kisim tok long maus bilong Pol na mi raitim dispela pas. Long nem bilong Bikpela mi salim gude long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Gaius, my host and host of the whole assembly, greets you. Erastus, the treasurer of the city, greets you, as does Quartus, the brother.

block.text: Gaius i salim gude long yupela. Em i lukautim mi gut long haus bilong en, na em i save lukautim olgeta manmeri bilong sios tu. taun, na brata bilong yumi Kwartus, tupela i salim gude long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all! Amen.

block.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all! Amen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now to him who is able to establish you according to my Good News and the preaching of Jesus Christ, according to the revelation of the mystery which has been kept secret through long ages,

block.text: God em inap long mekim yupela i sanap strong long bilip bilong yupela, olsem tok i stap long gutnius mi save autim, em gutnius bilong Jisas Krais. Dispela gutnius i bin i stap hait long olgeta taim bipo,

ReferenceBlocks.text: but now is revealed, and by the Scriptures of the prophets. According to the commandment of the eternal God, is made known for obedience of faith to all the nations;

block.text: tasol nau God i bin kamapim ples klia. God i save stap oltaim, em i bin tok, na mipela i autim long olgeta lain manmeri dispela tok bipo ol profet i bin raitim. Olsem na olgeta lain manmeri ol i save na i klia long dispela tok hait. God i bin mekim olsem bai ol manmeri bilong ol dispela lain i ken bilip long em na mekim ol pasin em i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to the only wise God, through Jesus Christ, to whom be the glory forever! Amen.

block.text: Dispela God, em wanpela tasol i gat save tru. Yumi mas tingting long ol samting em i bin mekim long han bilong Jisas Krais, na yumi mas litimapim nem bilong en oltaim oltaim. I tru.
